keyList.action: Make copy of selection with move tool
Make copy of selection when not in move tool
Select all opaque pixels on layer
keyList.macKey: Cmd–click on layer thumbnail (in Layers panel)
keyList.winKey: Ctrl-click on Layer Thumbnail (in Layers panel)

keyList.macKey: Double-click on Hand tool or Cmd-0
keyList.winKey: Double-click on Hand tool or Ctrl-0

keyList.macKey: Double-Click on Zoom Tool or Cmd-Option-0
keyList.winKey: Double-Click on Zoom Tool or Ctrl-Alt-0

keyList.action: Hide all panels except Toolbox and Options bar
Scroll image left or right in window
Toggles layer mask on/off as rubylith overlay

keyList.winKey: Click one layer, then Shift-Click another layer

keyList.action: Clone layer as you move it

keyList.winKey: Right-Click on the object with move tool

keyList.winKey: (While using move tool) Shift-Alt-letter (ie: N=Normal, M=Multiply. etc.)

keyList.action: Switch to layer below/above current layer

keyList.winKey: Double-Click on T thumbnail in Layers panel

Increase/Decrease size of selected text by 5 pts

keyList.winKey: While in any painting/editing tool-hold Ctrl

keyList.winKey: While in any painting/editing tool-turn Caps Lock on

keyList.winKey: Alt-Click on target with Colour Sampler tool

keyList.winKey: Ctrl-click on path name (in Paths panel)

keyList.action: Undo or Redo operations beyond last one

keyList.winKey: Hold Alt, Cancel turns into Reset Button, Click it

keyList.macKey: Hold Cmd, then Space. Then continue holding Space but let go of Cmd
keyList.winKey: Hold Control, then Space. (This will show the Zoom tool). Let go of Control so you see the Hand tool and immediately start dragging the mouse so you don't end up typing spaces. Be sure to let go of the Spacebar while dragging so you again don't type more spaces.

keyList.macKey: hold Option while dragging out a new guide
keyList.winKey: Hold Alt while dragging out a new guide
